name: MidnightKing
description:
Create your playstyle using the 8 weapons, 18 spells, and 6 elemental enhancements. Weapons dictate whether you play close, at ranged, defensively, fast, slow, etc. Spells consist of three types: active, passive, and passive(with cooldown). They have many offensive and defensive capabilities but they also have more specialized uses such as platforming. Enhancements cover 4 types of play damage, sustain, defense, mobility. You can max in one type or spread out.

Visit towns to learn what the past holds by uncovering knowledge from books you collect and translate.

Features:
    [Customizable way of kicking ass.Make choices to change the result but not the story.Passively or actively collect books to learn about the world.]
